halfOfString

public java.lang.String halfOfString(java.lang.String message,
                                     int start)
return a String that is every other character from message starting with the start position. For example, the call halfOfString(“Qbkm Zgis”, 0) returns the String “Qk gs” and the call halfOfString(“Qbkm Zgis”, 1) returns the String “bmZi”.

Parameters:
message - the encrypted message
start - the index halving starts at
Returns:
halved string

index of character with highest occurence.
